The CXML is only consulted at the 'build' stage of starting a crawl. Any 
changes to the CXML only take affect the next time that CXML is used to 
build a crawl.

To modify a running crawl, options are:

  - write script in the 'Scripting Console', or mutate simple values via 
the 'Browse Beans' page. This can accomplish almost anything but 
requires a deep knowledge of the crawl's internals.

- Checkpoint and then terminate the crawl. Make compatible changes to 
the CXML. (For example, if all-new beans are added the configuration, 
those beans will have to make do without having any prior state saved in 
the checkpoint.)  Build a new crawl from the altered CXML and resume 
from the prior checkpoint.

// Gordon @ IA
